firs stitch of the row fasten_off outer part flip your work upside-down and attach the yarn color e at the 6th stitch row 17 ch1 skip 1 3sc 5hdc half_double_crochet increase 3sc single_crochet jewelry wire to make your wings sturdier and easier to shape row 18 row 21 single_crochet in back loop only all around fasten_off left wing inner part color a make magic_ring magic_ring row 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 row 2 increase x 6 12 row 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 row 4 single_crochet single_crochet increase x 6 24 row 5 3sc increase x 6 switch to color b 30 row 6 4sc half_double_crochet increase x 6 switch to color c 36 row 7 5sc increase x 4 switch to color b 5hdc half_double_crochet 42 increase x 2 switch to color c row 8 6sc increase x 2 6hdc half_double_crochet increase x 3 6sc increase 48 switch to b in the next rounds we re going to crochet flat instead of in the round row 19 and 20 row 9 do not turn single_crochet 6hdc single_crochet 8 row 10 ch1 turn skip 1 single_crochet 4hdc 6 row 11 ch1 turn skip 1 single_crochet 2hdc 4 row 12 ch1 turn slip_stitch half_double_crochet slip_stitch 1 cut the b yarn and fasten_off flip your piece around on its wrong side attach your yarn to the top of the green extremity which is actually the bottom of the green extremity on the right side with c row 13-16 same as row 13-16 of the right wing except the wrong side and right side instructions are inverted for the left wing you start with the wrong side facing you in row 17 outer part flip your work upside down and with the wrong side facing you attach the yarn color e at the sixth stitch row 17-22 same
